data.title: “I’m never getting married”: Mila Kunis Changed Her Mind About Marrying Ashton Kutcher After a Painful Breakup With Ex-boyfriend
data.meta_description: Mila Kunis revealed making a pact with Ashton Kutcher about never getting married after their difficult past relationships.
data.text:
Mila Kunis is one of the most gorgeous and popular actresses, who earned fame at a very young age. The actress came to the limelight with her role in That ’70s Show, where she paired with Aston Kutcher for the first time. Though the actors formed the perfect pair on screen, the duo did not have similar thoughts in real life. The duo did not date and went through individual heartbreaks.

Advertisement

Mila Kunis opened up about dating her present husband, Ashton Kutcher, on the promise that they eventually ended up breaking.

Also read- “I’d be having an affair with her”: Ashton Kutcher Reveals Mila Kunis’ Advice After His Embarrassing Moment With Co-star Reese Witherspoon

Advertisement

Mila Kunis never wanted to Marry Ashton Kutcher

Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher met for the first time in 1998 for their show, That ’70s Show. While their character dated on and off, the actors never dated in real life. By 2003, Kutcher had started dating actress Demi Moore, who was 40, at the time. The couple married in 2005, but they filed for divorce in 2011.

It was around that time when Mila Kunis bumped into Kutcher again.

Talking about their accidental meet, she recalled in an interview,

Advertisement

“I was looking around, and there was a really beautiful man from the back. I was literally like, ‘Oh, he’s kinda hot’…and then he turned around, and I was like, “Oh my god, it’s Kutch.’ I thought it was the weirdest thing that I was checking this guy out, and it was someone that I had known forever.”

The actress shared that started dating casually as both of them had become freshly single. Kunis shared,

“We started dating with the idea that we both were never gonna get married. I was having the best time of my life, I had just come out of a relationship. He had come out of marriage. I said I was never gonna get married and he said great, neither am I. We were like shaking hands on it.”

She had broken up with her long-time boyfriend, Macaulay Culkin. The duo dated for a long duration, from 2002 to 2011.

Advertisement

Also read- “Because we were so poor”: Mila Kunis Was Booed Off the Stage After One Big Confession About Her Private Life

Mila Kunis’ marriage with Ashton Kutcher

The couple started casually dating around 2011, but it hit a rough patch when she realized Kutcher was also dating another girl. However, she had developed feelings for him, so she decided to walk away from him. Ashton Kutcher also realized that Kunis was special to him and asked her to move in with him. They began to officially date in 2012, and after two years of relationship, the couple got engaged. Kutcher proposed to Ted Star with a diamond ring from Tiffany’s worth $260,000.

Days after their engagement, Kunis announced on The Ellen DeGeneres Show that she was pregnant. The couple welcomed their daughter, Wyatt Isabelle Kutcher, on October 1, 2014. Kunis and Kutcher got married in a private ceremony in 2015. The couple welcomed their second child in 2016, a baby boy named Dimitri Portwood Kutcher.

Advertisement
